text: The Argentina national under-17 football team represents Argentina in youth international football. They have qualified for the FIFA U-17 World Cup where their best placing is third place three times. They have won the South American Under-17 Football Championship four times. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-17 World Cup=== Year Round Position GP W D1 L GS GA 1985 Group stage 9th 3 1 1 1 5 4 1987
